body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, jail night watchman. Kentucky native. Married to Rachel Farmer. Father of Angeline Farmer, Thomas Farmer, Elizabeth Farmer, Clarissa Farmer, Sarah Farmer, and Mary Farmer.
